public.title: Public messages
public.threadTitlePlaceholder: Thread title (optional, not all clients show this)
public.filterOnlyDirectFollow: Only show posts from people you follow
public.filterOnlyThreads: Hide replies (only show the first message of a thread)

connections.title: Connections
connections.unsupportedConnectionTypeX:
This SSB client does support connections of type '{connType}'.

Unfortunately, browsers place a lot of restrictions on how we can connect.  Most communications have to be done over WebSockets, and the invite code you're using doesn't appear to support them.  Sorry!

onboarding.title: New user
onboarding.welcomeMessage: Welcome! It looks like you're new here. All of this information is entirely optional, but it does tend to help get you up and running quickly and easily.
onboarding.profileName: Pick a name for yourself (you can change this later under Profile):
onboarding.profileDescription: If you want, you can type up a short bio:
onboarding.profileDescriptionPlaceholder: (A short bio about you - Markdown formatting is supported)
onboarding.suggestedPeers: Here are some preset servers you can connect to:
onboarding.suggestedFollows: And here are some people you might like to follow:

private.title: Private messages
private.blankFieldError: Please provide both subject and text in private messages

profile.title: Profile {name}
profile.exportKey: Export feed key to mnemonic code
profile.loadKey: Load feed key from mnemonic code
profile.showMnemonicCodeAbout: A mnemonic code has been generated from your private feed key.
profile.showMnemonicCodeWarning: This code can be used to restore your identitfy later. Store this somewhere safe.
profile.enterMnemonicCodeAbout: Enter mnemonic code below to restore your feed key.
profile.enterMnemonicCodeWarning: WARNING: this will overwrite your current feed key!
profile.blockedButNotDeleted: Failed to delete messages, but user is blocked.

settings.title: Settings
settings.capsKey: Caps key (leave blank to use default):
settings.capsKeyWarning: (Only change this if you really, really know what you're doing.)
settings.refreshForChanges: You may have to refresh your browser for these changes to take effect.

thread.title: Thread "{title}"
thread.unknownMessage: Unknown message type or message outside follow graph
